text: Willem Kyng gret Ægelmær biscop & Raulf Erl & Norðman & alle myne thegnaes on Suffolc frendliche; & ic kythe ihu that ic wille that tha sokna thas Nigende half hundredes liggan into tham halgan mynstre act Seynt Edmundes biri, sua ful & sua forth so it Ælfric Wythgares sone biwiste & Ordgar sythen Ymme thaere Quen to hande Eadwardes moder kinges mynes maeges & he self thider inne geunnen haefde on eallan thingan; that is on frithwyte & on flitwyte & on aebberethef & on grithbryche & on forstealle & on hamsocne.
Nu forbede ic aellan manne tha sokne him to hande to teonne aegðe ge engliscan ge frenciscan ge deniscan butan Seint Edmund & Baldewyne Abbote.
An gif aenig heonan forth thisan withqueðan wille, ic wille wytan thonne what he sy.
